message.raw:
- Rewrite XML.iterfind for more thorough support of XPath.
- Add _default_iter_path attribute for parsers like TandemXML and custom classes that have predicates in default iteration.
- TaskMappingMixin: use separate done Event for each process.
- TaskMappingMixin: raise error in map() if index is not present.
- IndexedXML: make sure _offset_index is None if use_index is False.
- XML, IndexedXML: Keep _use_index, _read_schema and _iterative as class attributes for ease of subclassing.
message.html:
• Rewrite XML.iterfind for more thorough support of XPath.
  • Add _default_iter_path attribute for parsers like TandemXML and custom classes that have predicates in default iteration.
  • TaskMappingMixin: use separate done Event for each process.
  • TaskMappingMixin: raise error in map() if index is not present.
  • IndexedXML: make sure _offset_index is None if use_index is False.
  • XML, IndexedXML: Keep _use_index, _read_schema and _iterative as class attributes for ease of subclassing.

message:
- Rewrite XML.iterfind for more thorough support of XPath.
- Add _default_iter_path attribute for parsers like TandemXML and custom classes that have predicates in default iteration.
- TaskMappingMixin: use separate done Event for each process.
- TaskMappingMixin: raise error in map() if index is not present.
- IndexedXML: make sure _offset_index is None if use_index is False.
- XML, IndexedXML: Keep _use_index, _read_schema and _iterative as class attributes for ease of subclassing.
